chapters.title: 3.33 — The Invisible Probe: Covert Verification of the ‘PC Russell’ Diversion (18 June 2025)

paragraphs.text: On 18 June 2025, a triage-level 101 call was used as an ‘invisible probe’. By staying at triage, Ben confirmed the existence of a decoy case (…93423) under ‘PC Russell’, running in parallel to the original stalking case (…305). Four days later, the Russell case disappeared and control reverted to PC Dixon — exposing a pre‑prepared deception dismantled after detection.
allegations: Catastrophic safeguarding breaches by Sussex Police

t1_sussex_police_chronology.title: Invisible Probe — triage call confirms ‘PC Russell’ decoy (…93423)
t1_sussex_police_chronology.notes: Decoy confirmed at triage; reversed on 2025-06-22 with consolidation to Dixon.
